items.text: Details of all cases at various stages shall appear on the dashboard
Enter basic details of applicant on this screen
Enter work location details of applicant
Successful message appears on the screen
Enter basic details of co-applicant here
“State”, ‘city” and “district “are auto populated after entering pincode
Successful message appears on the screen
User can edit the KYC details here if any changes needed
Details of Income from business and
Choose for which year the income is
Enter details of the Income tax paid by the applicant
Choose for which year the income is
GPR details shall appear here and can be edited, as applicable
Request status shall be displayed here
Details of Income from business and profession shall be displayed here
Choose for which year the income is
Choose for which year the income is
Request status shall be displayed here
This page displays the Additional Financial Details of the applicant, if any
Once selected on “List of Signatories” the below mentioned fields will have to be entered
Save or Cancel as the case may be to
move on to Open Charges section
Business reference data will be displayed here
Now we will enter the Additional Financial Details of the Co-applicant, if any
Business reference data will be displayed here
Ratio Analysis based on Profit and Loss shall be captured here
Enter the Liabilities as per Balance Sheet
Enter Assets details as per Balance Sheet
Financial ratios will be calculated accordingly
Cash Flow statement will be made accordingly
Once Cash Flow Statement is Saved, success message shall appear
A consolidated statement shall be displayed here
Return back to the Application Summary page
Here we can see the stages of application and its progress
Application can be sent back to “Demog Data Entry” or “Financial Data Entry”, if required
Regulatory details of the application shall be displayed here
Primary application details to be filled here
Request process status shall appear here
Click Options from Radio Buttons as applicable
Now we proceed to the CAM/underwriting summary,
Once clicked on CAM Summary, we are directed to this page. Loan application summary is displayed here
Applicant details summary shall be displayed here
Background details summary will be displayed here
Primary application details summary will be displayed here
Exposure details summary will be displayed here
Eligibility parameter details will be displayed here
Ratios summary will be displayed here
Salary Credit summary will be displayed here
Asset details summary will be displayed here
Banking details summary will be displayed here
Property Verification details summary will be displayed here
Verification details summary will be displayed here
System driven NFA to be triggered
shall reflect here along with approval
Additional NFA, if any, can be entered
NFA description to be entered here
Basis the description, list of NFA
Once saved, all system driven NFAs and
manually entered NFAs shall reflect here
Sanction conditions shall be displayed here
any, can be added from here
Approval Flow data shall be entered here
Choose the “type of authority” as applicable from the dropdown
After CAM Summary, we shall now initiate verification checks
Scroll down on the applicant summary page
We can see the list of verifications
We shall be able to see the personal discussion details of the applicant and co-applicant on this page
List of agencies for personal discussion evaluation shall be displayed
Status of initiation shall be displayed here
Status of initiation shall be displayed here
Field investigation details for residence, office, and other
List of agencies for field investigation evaluation shall be displayed
Once initiated, details of the same shall appear here
Similarly, we can initiate/waive off field
Similarly, Primary collateral property field investigation can be initiated or waived off
Dedupe results of the property shall be displayed here
redone, or given an UPID from here
Next, we click on Validation & Checks tab to
List of agencies for technical evaluation shall be displayed
Status of initiation shall be displayed here
Technical, Legal, TSR as per discretion
Once all verifications are done, by
